title: Tampa Bay Buccaneers give up seven turnovers as they go down to Carolina Panthers in NFL London
text:
The Carolina Panthers have beaten the Tampa Bay Buccaneers by 37-26 at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in London.

Impressive Panthers quarterback Kyle Allen ensured that the franchise may have a selection dilemma on their hands when first-choice Cam Newton eventually returns from a metatarsal injury in the next fortnight or so.

Allen passed for 227 yards with two touchdown passes. Star running back Christian McCaffrey confirmed his status as the NFL's form back with two touchdowns, one receiving and one rushing.

The NFL leader in touchdowns and rushing yards further advanced his MVP case with another commanding display. Curtis Samuel likewise went into the endzone twice, again once as a receiver and once on the run-play.

Allen's opposite number Jameis Winston passed for significantly more yards - 400 - but the story of the game was told by the five interceptions he threw. This talented player, a number one overall draft pick, has yet to locate consistency in his game.
description: The Carolina Panthers have beaten the Tampa Bay Buccaneers by 37-26 at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in London.
